requirement_text:
As a user, I want to access the system at any given time.
As a patient, I want to assign a doctor to my medical profile so that he can access it.
As a doctor, I want to restrict my view to only assigned patient medical records, so that the patient’s confidentiality is maintained.
As a doctor, I want to assign another doctor to the medical record, in case multiple doctors of different specialties need to be involved.
As a doctor, I want to transfer digital medical records to this system, so that I have all the info consolidated in one place.
As a patient, I want to be able to access my medical record, so that I can see the medical record’s details.
As a doctor, I want to be able to access the patient’s medical record, so that I can see the medical record’s details.
As a Lab Specialist, I want to be able to access the patient’s medical record, so that I can see the medical record’s details.
As a patient, I want to be able to edit specific parts of my medical record, so that I can keep my record updated.
As a doctor, I want to be able to edit specific parts of the patient’s medical record that I am assigned to, so that I can keep the record updated and so that other users involved can see the changes I have made.
As a lab specialist, I want to be able to edit specific parts of the patient’s medical record that I am assigned to, so that I can keep the record updated and so that other users involved can see the changes I have made.
As patient, I want to be able to link my fitness device to this software, so that I can make use of the data that is generated by my fitness device.
As a patient, I want to be able to upload my fitness data to this software, so that doctors can have more information about my daily life.
As a lab specialist, I want to be able to upload lab results to the medical record, so that the assigned doctor and the patient can see the results.
As a nurse, I want to be able to link an external device to the software, so that the data generated can be uploaded automatically to the software.
As a doctor, I want to be able to link an external device to the software, so that the data generated can be uploaded automatically to the software.
As a patient, I want to be able to see the results from external devices (i.e. blood pressure, CT scans, etc.), so I can monitor my progress over time.
As a doctor, I want to be able to enter results from external devices manually, so that in case there is a malfunction in the linking process or in the external device itself I can still input the result on the medical record.
As a doctor, I want to be able to edit and add notes to different parts of the medical records, so that I can better assess the situation and keep myself informed for the next time I read the medical record.
As a patient, I want to be able to give or reject authorization to link an external device (i.e.: fitness band) to my medical record, so I that I can maintain my confidentiality.
As a patient, I want to control who gets to see the data generated by my external devices, so that I can keep my privacy.
As a patient, I want to be able to log in the software using DigiD, because it is convenient and saves time.
As a user, I want to have a unique log in (username and password), so that the system would be more secure.
As a doctor, I want to order a medical test to be run by the lab specialists, so that I can have it on the patient’s medical record.
As a doctor, I want to rate the importance of the medical test (urgent or not), so that the lab specialists can manage their time better and work on what is most important first.
As a lab specialist, I want to view the requested medical tests, so that I can start working on them.
As a lab specialist, I want to add a note to the lab test results, so that the doctor can have a better understanding of the results.
As a patient, I want to be able to see my lab test results on my medical record, so that I have everything in one document.
As a lab specialist, I want to be able to link a lab test with a medical record, so that everything can be contained in one document.
As a receptionist, I want to be able to book an appointment for a patient with a doctor.
As a receptionist, I want to be able to assign a bed for a patient, so that the patient has a place to stay while in the hospital.
As a receptionist, I want to be able to assign a doctor for a patient, so that if the patient does not know any doctors, I can do it for them.
As a user, I want to be able to access the system from different devices (mobile phone, tablets, computers etc.), so that I can use whatever is available to access the software.
As a user, I want to be able to access any document no matter in which department I am, so that I can have better accessibility.
As a user, I want to be able to access the system 24/7, so that I have maximum availability and ensure my users can use the system at any time.

use_cases.name: Book Appointments
use_cases.description: Allow the receptionist to book a patient’s appointment with a doctor.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a receptionist, I want to be able to book an appointment for a patient with a doctor.

use_cases.name: Assign Patient Beds
use_cases.description: Allow the receptionist to assign a hospital bed to a patient.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a receptionist, I want to be able to assign a bed for a patient, so that the patient has a place to stay while in the hospital.

use_cases.name: Assign Doctors
use_cases.description: Allow users to assign one or more doctors to a patient, medical profile, or medical record.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a receptionist, I want to be able to assign a doctor for a patient, so that if the patient does not know any doctors, I can do it for them.
As a patient, I want to assign a doctor to my medical profile so that he can access it.
As a doctor, I want to assign another doctor to the medical record, in case multiple doctors of different specialties need to be involved.

use_cases.name: Restrict Record Access
use_cases.description: Allow doctors to limit their view to only the medical records they are assigned to.

user_stories.action: restrict view to assigned medical records
user_stories.original_sentence: As a doctor, I want to restrict my view to only assigned patient medical records, so that the patient’s confidentiality is maintained.

use_cases.name: Access Medical Records
use_cases.description: Allow authorized users to access and view patient medical records.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a patient, I want to be able to access my medical record, so that I can see the medical record’s details.
As a doctor, I want to be able to access the patient’s medical record, so that I can see the medical record’s details.
As a Lab Specialist, I want to be able to access the patient’s medical record, so that I can see the medical record’s details.

use_cases.name: Edit Medical Records
use_cases.description: Allow authorized users to modify specific parts of patient medical records.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a patient, I want to be able to edit specific parts of my medical record, so that I can keep my record updated.

As a doctor, I want to be able to edit specific parts of the patient’s medical record that I am assigned to, so that I can keep the record updated and so that other users involved can see the changes I have made.

As a lab specialist, I want to be able to edit specific parts of the patient’s medical record that I am assigned to, so that I can keep the record updated and so that other users involved can see the changes I have made.

use_cases.name: Manage Medical Notes
use_cases.description: Allow doctors to add and edit notes within medical records.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a doctor, I want to be able to edit and add notes to different parts of the medical records, so that I can better assess the situation and keep myself informed for the next time I read the medical record.

use_cases.name: Manage Medical Tests
use_cases.description: Allow doctors to order and prioritize medical tests and lab specialists to view requested tests.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a doctor, I want to order a medical test to be run by the lab specialists, so that I can have it on the patient’s medical record.
As a doctor, I want to rate the importance of the medical test (urgent or not), so that the lab specialists can manage their time better and work on what is most important first.
As a lab specialist, I want to view the requested medical tests, so that I can start working on them.

use_cases.name: Authenticate
use_cases.description: Allow users to securely log in and access the system from various devices with unique credentials.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a user, I want to access the system at any given time.
As a user, I want to have a unique log in (username and password), so that the system would be more secure.
As a user, I want to be able to access the system from different devices (mobile phone, tablets, computers etc.), so that I can use whatever is available to access the software.
As a user, I want to be able to access the system 24/7, so that I have maximum availability and ensure my users can use the system at any time.
As a patient, I want to be able to log in the software using DigiD, because it is convenient and saves time.

use_cases.name: Access Department Documents
use_cases.description: Allow users to access documents across all departments regardless of their current location.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a user, I want to be able to access any document no matter in which department I am, so that I can have better accessibility.

use_cases.name: Authorize External Devices
use_cases.description: Allow patients to grant or deny authorization for external devices and control access to their generated data.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a patient, I want to be able to give or reject authorization to link an external device (i.e.: fitness band) to my medical record, so I that I can maintain my confidentiality.
As a patient, I want to control who gets to see the data generated by my external devices, so that I can keep my privacy.

use_cases.name: Manage Lab Results
use_cases.description: Allow lab specialists to upload, annotate, and link lab test results to patient medical records.

user_stories.action: upload lab results to medical record
user_stories.original_sentence: As a lab specialist, I want to be able to upload lab results to the medical record, so that the assigned doctor and the patient can see the results.

user_stories.action: add note to lab test results
user_stories.original_sentence: As a lab specialist, I want to add a note to the lab test results, so that the doctor can have a better understanding of the results.

user_stories.action: link lab test to medical record
user_stories.original_sentence: As a lab specialist, I want to be able to link a lab test with a medical record, so that everything can be contained in one document.

use_cases.name: Link External Devices
use_cases.description: Allow users to connect external or fitness devices so their data is automatically uploaded to the system.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a nurse, I want to be able to link an external device to the software, so that the data generated can be uploaded automatically to the software.
As a doctor, I want to be able to link an external device to the software, so that the data generated can be uploaded automatically to the software.
As a patient, I want to link my fitness device to this software so that I can make use of the data that is generated by my fitness device.

use_cases.name: View Test Results
use_cases.description: Allow patients to view lab and external device results associated with their medical record.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a patient, I want to be able to see the results from external devices (i.e. blood pressure, CT scans, etc.), so I can monitor my progress over time.
As a patient, I want to be able to see my lab test results on my medical record, so that I have everything in one document.

use_cases.name: Upload Device Data
use_cases.description: Allow doctors and patients to manually enter or upload data from external or fitness devices into the system.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a doctor, I want to be able to enter results from external devices manually, so that in case there is a malfunction in the linking process or in the external device itself I can still input the result on the medical record.
As a patient, I want to be able to upload my fitness data to this software, so that doctors can have more information about my daily life.

use_cases.name: Import Medical Records
use_cases.description: Allow doctors to transfer and import digital medical records into the system for consolidation.

user_stories.original_sentence: As a doctor, I want to transfer digital medical records to this system, so that I have all the info consolidated in one place.
